result.execSummary:
The defendant Lorilei L Barwick was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: DEFT SENTENCED TO WORK CREW OR 20 DAYS KCJ.  Deft to report to the work crew office.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lorilei L Barwick

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Satisfaction of court order. Completed work crew for mandatory sentence.
Signed up for work crew per judge's order for mandatory sentence.

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in person w/Atty Robert Keller.  Case is resolved.  Victim rights compliance.  Deft pleads guilty; found guilty by the Court.  Sentencing arguments made.  Deft sentenced to 20 days work crew or 20 days KCJ.  Deft to report to the work crew office on 3/14/16 @ 8am.  Costs waived.  DNA ordered; notice given to deft.  Appeal rights.

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in person w/Atty Bob Keller.  Defense requests an adjournment; the case will be resolved.  No objection by the State.  Plea/sentencing hrg set for 3/10/16 @ 9am.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

Pre-trial conference at 12-04-2015 01:15 pm.
Final pre-trial at 01-06-2016 01:50 pm.
Jury selection at 01-25-2016 09:00 am.

155pm  Special Prosecutor Attorney Daniel Tombasco  appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Robert Keller.  Clerk JThwing. Minutes:  Plea of Not Guilty entered.  Deft demands jury trial.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 4, 2015 at 01:15 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for January 6, 2016 at 01:50 pm.  Jury selection scheduled for January 25, 2016 at 09:00 am.  Bond continued.  kmk

1:55 pm  Special Prosc Dan Tombasco appeared for the State.    Defendant appeared in court in person.  Def. is referred to the Public Defender.  If not eligible, def. to retain his own counsel. Court date will not be adjourned due to def.'s failure to retain counsel.  Clerk:  JT.  Arraignment adjourned to 11-4-15 @ 1:00.  Deft demands jury trial.  $500 signature bond set with conditions.
And demand for discovery - filed by ADA R Delgado.
and witness list filed by the State
